values:
Who shows up on my first night performing my woman underneath it all act?

Frankie!

Seems like in my anxiousness to get the new show started I've missed a lot.

Including Miss O's birthday!  How could she not have mentioned it I'll never know, but I'm upset with her.  My very best friend and she doesn't even let me do something nice for her on her birthday!

Now I have to think of something to make it special.  Late, but still.


I've heard Kost is not doing well.  I want to do something, but I don't know what.  *sigh*

*picks up a present sitting on the bed*  I open the card- love Giselle.

A tie.  For the act.

*grins*

Sweet.

*goes to the klub*

has been interesting to say the very least. Well I heard some whispers about Kost's parents. I can't imagine losing both of them so close together. Well if it were me, I probably wouldn't care, but I hear she cared for her mother. Poor thing. Maybe I'll take her some chocolates since I have a little extra money laying around. Oh? You don't know about the extra money? Well I got in an argument with that utter brute Eric. It's not my fault he couldn't get it up! I did try, so I figure he at least owes me ten marks for effort right? Does he give it to me? Oh he gave me something alright, a shove down the stairs, a black eye and a sore throat. That bastard. And who comes to my rescue? Adam! Adam of all people; I'm still amazed. He paid Eric 75 marks for me and I ... took care of any needs he needed satisfying. Well when I got home Giselle told me she hated seeing me like this and that she knew a man who would give us money if we posed for some pictures for him. So I'm rich! Rich I tell you! Ok not rich, but comfortable. And I'm paying Adam back, don't ask me why, but I am. So I'm off to Ophilia's to see if he's there, check on O and then I'm on my way to the club. Maybe I'll run into Leon or Danny, but probably not, haven't seen much of them lately. *leaves for Ophilia's* Rosie

I wrote Frankie a letter telling her how much we all miss her. I do miss her. She's a nice kid. I still haven't seen Danny or Leon since I went look... err around the club. Not that I was looking or anything. Maybe I'll run into one or the other tonite. It seems everyone is off doing their own thing. I hardly see anyone anymore. Not that I care. Because I don't. It's not like they are family or anything. 'Cept O- Ophilia is my sister. I'm worried about all of us. Stories about that Hitler man abound. I will not worry about it. What's the worst that could happen? Gah! I am late, Herr Groo is expecting me! Rosie

Well Frankie is alive and well last we heard. There was a post sent to the Klub Oh me and Dolores have come to a truce of sorts. She explained to me about Kost and I understand. I mean hey we all have demons right? I haven't seen Danny in awhile, I even went to the club thinking maybe I'd run into him but I did see Ophilia. I'm so glad I saw her that night. I may not be much to anybody but I can be her friend. And I will be no matter what. Anybody ever says anything about O and I'll ... I'll knock their block right off! Anyway after I skipped a show and spent some time with O we headed downstairs and that damn Danny still hadn't shown. Eh, so I went on and I saw O talking to some guy. Well he turns out to be Danny's uncle Leon. Oh I like this man. I really do. Charming as a snake and free with the whiskey and his money. He can come by anytime he likes. Oh and the maestra is pregnant! By our Herman! *gasp* I was so surprised! But I'm happy for him. There's this crazy rumour going 'round that Kost and Adam got stuck in an elevator- naked! *laughs* I'll have to ask Danny as he seems to be the hero in all of this. Or maybe I'll simply ask Leon. But then again you can never be to sure whether he's telling the truth or not. *stops* Wonder why I thought Danny would tell me the truth. *shakes head and looks over to where Giselle is sleeping* "I'll see you later hon." I whisper. *dresses and goes to the club* "No no I am not late, I'm just on time! Herman pour me a drink I'll get it on my way back from changing ..." *walking back to the dressing room* "Emcee darling please, I will be ready in less than 5 minutes, let me change have a drink and I'll be ready to go." *goes and changes, comes out* "Thanks Herman." *kisses his cheek, downs her drink and goes backstage ready to perform.* *Rosie comes flouncing out shaking her hips from side to side in an exagerrated way and starts to sing* If I could shimmy like my sister Kate Shake it like jelly on a plate My mama wanted to know last night How sister Kate could do it oh so nice Now, all the boys in the neighborhood Knew Kate could shimmy, and it's mighty good I may be late but I'll be up to date When I can shimmy like my sister Kate. I mean, shake it like my sister Kate. Now if I could shake it like my sister Kate, Never stay home, stay out too late I get my stuff about as high as a kite You know I do it for you every night. Now, all the boys in the neighborhood Knew Kate could shimmy, and it's mighty good I know I'm late but I'll be up to date When I can shimmy like my sister Kate. I mean, shake it like my sister Kate. *goes offstage, wipes her face, powders her face and goes out to the bar* Rosie

I won't. He's kinda sweet though. After that disasterous attempt of seduction with Dolores I suppose I've been feeling old and well ... unattractive. Maybe it's Herr Groo, telling me what a good wife I'd be, putting all these thoughts of a normal life in my head. Hmmph, what's normal anyway? Herr Groo isn't old, he isn't young, but he's nice. I mean just a nice man. With a wretched wife who married him simply to get out of her house. Many times he stays and talks to me. He's lonely, but not like most of the men I meet. It's like his soul is haunted by what could have been. And now he's got me thinking what could have been if my father hadn't ... no I will not think about it. Now Danny with his quick smile and kind words, he's another matter. It seems all the girls have it for him and I'm starting to see why. He came off as a jerk when I first met him, well and that whole Giselle thing ... but he's actually pretty nice. And he did get me nearly triple with George the other night. *smiles at the memory* Yes, he's definately a good way to keep certain customers jealous. *sigh* Rosie

I check my eyes for wrinkles one more time. No, everything is fine; smooth and wrinkle free. The ladies are holding up nicely I notice as I push them up just a bit. My hair is shiny and soft. So what was it? Was I not obvious enough? It seemed as though she was interested. She touched my hand ... Maybe she wasn't happy the last time! No, no I'm being ridiculous. No one leaves me without being satisfied. Ugh. I practically threw myself at her! I'll uh, be in my changing room ... you know changing, where I'll be half-naked and waiting for you. And she never showed! What is wrong with Dolores anyway!? Maybe it's me ... maybe I'm losing it, the touch. Rosie

Mmm, I love when Giselle brushes my hair. She tends to it carefully. Sectioning it, getting the knots out. Caressing it, loving it. Loving me. It's nice. I try to do the same for her. I buy her perfume or a scarf but I don't know what she thinks of it. I've been seeing this new man, name is Herr Groo and he likes to do things for me. He's a giver. He wants to brush my hair, bath me, or just take care of me like I'm a child or doll or something. But it's different when Zell does it. I want to know if she feels like I buy her things because she's here; because it's my job to make her happy or because I care? Because I do care. *kind of sad* I'm getting in one of those moods. Those dark, I want to drink too much kind of moods and I don't want that to happen. I've been thinking about my father again. About what he made me. I hate him. I see these men, like Herr Groo, and he has a wife at home but she won't do somethings for him and I can't believe it. here is this wonderful man willing to do anything for her and she doesn't realize how lucky she is. *sighs* Why am I thinking these things? Marriage is not going to happen, love is a dream for teenagers and the rest is all a childhood fantasy. Perhaps I am wishing I had had a chance. *goes to the club* Rosie

Ophilia and I went out in search of the Emcee, we were going to *grins* have our wicked way with him. Anyway, we couldn't find him! Wasn't that rotten of him to be in hiding when we were so in need of his services?! So we found a couple nice boys and danced and played with them but in the end I went home to Giselle. But wait, it gets better. The next night after I performed I ran in the Emcee who looked perfectly decadent and who invited me upstairs to talk. Oh and talk we did! I didn't leave his room for three days! Oh that man. *sigh* He's a tiny little thing but he has stamina! So I was telling him about my and O's problem and he offered to assist us! Wheeeeeeeeeeee. So the next night I brought O upstairs with me. I think at first she was a little put off by the host, but really, how can you not love him? Giselle has remarked on how happy I seem. I'm glad she understands my need for a man on occasion. *stretches* This has been an excellent week. But now the rents due and I haven't worked my second job all week. *sad* I like having sex for fun. *puts on lipstick* But now it's time to pay the rent. Rosie

Giselle, sweet as she is, is starting to drive me completely insane. I cannot even say Dolores' name around her. And she can't even say her name. She calls her that little Spanish bitch. *sighs* I mean am I the only one that remembers Danny? Because if I'm correct she was off fucking him everytime I wasn't around. *sighs* Sad thing is, I like Zell, don't want to not be around her. I need a man. Not a customer, no I want someone ... someone I can play with, have some fun with. I miss the Emcee. Where the hell is he? I'd go spend some time with Herman but he's been in a bit of a funk lately. You know, we need more men around here. And as desperate as I am for a nice hot cock I am not going near that detestable Adam. *laughs* Maybe if I get Ophilia drunk again ... Hmm yeah, I don't see that happening. So I was talking to Frankie about all this and she was damn nice about it, I kissed her. Wasn't an invite or anything just a ... thanks, I guess you could say. *sigh* Going to go hunt down the Emcee ... uhuh, yep, that's what I'm going to do. *heads to the club* Rosie

Dolores vs Giselle pt II First there was a catfight. This is not good, Then Dolores shows up again with a black eye; not given to her by Giselle although Zell says if she comes over again she'll give her a matching one. If I were a man I'd wonder why I can't keep it in my pants but for now I'll simply wonder why I can't keep my skirt from being over my head. *laughs* It's not as though I am throwing Dolores in Giselle's face. I mean I adore my Zell, simply adore her. I'm friends with Dolores. Ok so once in awhile we share umm ... uh, yeah anyway, we're friends. We're going to get her a tattoo soon. Zell is not thrilled at the amount of time I'm spending with my Spanish rose, but I can't help it. Off to work. *enters the Kit Kat Klub, changes and waits at the bar until it's time to perform* Rosie

Ahh, the luxury of having money. My trip with Dolores has left me with enough money to buy Christmas presents. Not that I actually care about these people ... I don't. They ... well I've simply grown used to them. Some more than others. Oh hell. I care. A little bit. So I went shopping. Had to put on a nice dress, so as not to get tossed out of some of the family establishments. Which was hilarious as I had serviced many of the owners of these stores. Eh, it's ok. When wifey wasn't looking I got a discount. Oh when I went to leave presents at the club I discovered ... those bastards left me gifts. Damnit. Herman- a poem. And ... and he didn't mention my breasts once in it. Ophilia- that bitch got me and Zell beautiful lockets. Damn her... Lulu- left food. Good food ... As stunning as she is, I'm glad she's not my woman, I'd be fat in no time. Helga gave out perfume that doesn't make me smell like a German whore! Love it! Damned little brat. Sally, Sally Sally ... always thinking of the Klub got us stockings. Personally I think they look best on the floor, but that's probably because that's where Zell likes them ... After all of that, I had to go to my dressing room so they wouldn't see my tears. Damn them. Oh but the presents I bought ... I got Dolores a corset! I did. It's black with a red rose that sits right between her perfect breasts. I had to get it! For Frenchie and Lulu I bought naughty postcards and some perfume. I saw the most darling suspenders (men's over the shoulders) and got them for Frankie. I hope she likes them. For Fritzie (what to get for the girl who can get whatever she wants?) I found a skirt with hidden pockets in it. To protect your valuables from thieves. *laughs* Sharing a love of books with Helga I got her selected poems of the American- Robert Frost. I wasn't sure what to get Herman. It seems as though whenever someone needs him, he's there... so I got him a record. It's called Me and My Shadow by Al Jolson. Sally ... shopping for Sally was interesting. Went in a shop and said, "Give me all the offbeat nail polish colors you have." Our dear Emcee ... if he were here I know what I'd give him, but of course he's not here. So he has some cigarettes and a glass jar of Vaseline; since he's so fond of self love. My male friends tell me it's quite handy when they are alone and in need of ... release. Hope he understands ... eh, if not he can use it to soften his skin or make things a little easier next time he has a male overnight guest. For O, I got an Oriental jade pendant- well it looks jade. I left little trinkets for the others. And then there's Giselle. I didn't know what to get for her. How to express how much she ... I talked this darling man into buying me a mink ... it's gorgeous. It will look wonderful around Zellie's shoulders. I have friends. Real friends. Rosie

But not forgotten. I've never even kissed him, I've barely said two words to him yet I've offered him the world on a plate. For Giselle. She's so sad... she's even called his name a few times in her sleep. And not that languid, liquidy voice of hers; no this is one of pain and misery. She loves him. At least I think she does. So I told him, you come back to her. You do it and you can have me whenever, however you want. Anything to see the smile return to Zell's face. We shall see. Rosie

Met some marvelous men. Read that to mean generous. Went on a fabulous working trip with Dolores. Oh my... she knows how to get the job done. Me and Zell are getting along fine. All is right in the world. *sigh* Must go see O soon, it's been far too long. *drops in the club on my way back from another week out of town* Rosie

Things are much better with Giselle. We... worked the kinks out. I was smiley broadly the next evening, even the Emcee remarked upon it. I don't care. We're not fighting. It bothered me more than I let on. *works* Rosie

Don't get drunk, piss of your customer and then smart mouth him about ... well anything.

*puts ice on her eye*

Damn Giselle had me so mad.

Sniffing around like some... *sighs*

I know, my fault.  Treated her like dirt.

Not going to think about it.

*heads to the dressing room to apply some makeup before anyone sees me*

Maybe I'll visit Ophilia tonite.  She always cheers me.  Oh wait, she has that man staying with her.

*sigh*

I decided to laze about and read today. I picked up an old copy of I don't even recall what it was now... and they fell out. Roses. Pressed roses. *starts to cry* Kisa's dead. Stupid, stupid girl. I've known for how long now? And today is the day I cry? *touches the flowers* She sent me these... don't know why I kept them. Guess I'm more sentimental than I like to admit. I've been ok until I saw those damn flowers. She meant something to me. *caresses the flowers* And I guess I meant something to her too. If Zell ever... I have to see her. No, I'm being silly, Zell... she's doing fine. I just saw her yesterday. Still... I just need to see her. *dresses and heads for the club, goes to the bar where Helga and some man in a silk suit are talking and orders a drink* Rosie

My sweet, sweet Ophilia. What a way to perk up a girl's night. As usual I was feeling sorry for myself but I must say she cheered me right up. If only it could have lasted. After my lovely evening with O, I come home to a very drunk and pissed off Giselle. She likes her new life. Well good for her. I didn't ask her for the extra money, or presents or anything! She acts like I owe her something. Well I don't. She moved out that day. I have seen her since then, we had a wonderful row at the club. If it weren't for Herman intervening... I don't know what would have happened. I did go on that night and perform, and I've stayed away from the bottle lately. I'm going to be ok. I am. I think. *takes her makeup off and goes out to socialize* Rosie

I'm tired. Tired of working. Tired of dancing, tired of fucking. Tired of caring. They make me care and do they care in return? Noooo. That would be too much trouble. Giselle is now on me about my drinking. Fuck her. I'm sure she understands that. So I told her she's a little whore. Or something to that effect. I'm not really sure, that night is a bit fuzzy in my brain. My dear friend, O is nowhere to be found. Probably slumming with that Kost and Dolores. Herman is glued to his dear one. Helga... I'm too tired to get involved. Why bother? She doesn't care. Oh I'm feeling so sorry for myself. *takes another drink* Lula- I thought we were going somewhere, instead she picks up and goes to Paris. Giselle and her, 'Oh the host isn't going to be pleased with this... he won't be pleased with that.' Well you know what? Fuck him! Fuck them all. I don't care about them. None of them. Bunch of sewer rats the lot of them. And the Emcee, entices me when I show up, so full of kindness. I haven't even seen that lil prick since my unfortunate illness. *cries in my whiskey* I'm so unhappy. Rosie

So much has been going on, I've been trying to stay out of it. You would think with everything happening I'd be more upset over the big things... but I'm not. I do not like Danny. Ok I take that back, I do like him. I think he's a horrible, horrible influence on my sweet Giselle. Months ago she would blush if a man looked at her the wrong way. Now every other word out of her mouth is that favorite of Danny's- fuck. Fuck him. Fuck this. Fuck that. Fuck fuck fuck. Such a dirty word coming out of a sweet mouth. And the way she uses it! Not just as an adjective like normal people. I hate that fucking man. Nooo Giselle improvises. I want a cold, fucking drink. Adverbing it. Gah! The world is crumbling and I'm worried about Zell's use of the word fuck. I'm going to the club and getting a fucking drink. Rosie

9-28 Giselle tells me she loves me. Not that big a deal right? She's told me before. Oh that's right, she tells me in front a carful of people! Gee, put me on the spot! I know I hurt her feelings when I brushed her off jokingly. But what was I supposed to do? Declare my undying love for her? I told her how it was from the beginning! Everyone was uncomfortable after that. 9-29 I have resumed sleeping at the club. I hate the tension I now feel around Zell. She's a good girl, and I do care about her. But I do not love her! 9-30 been looking for the Emcee. I just want a good, clean romp! Herman is taken, Danny seems smitten with Frankie and I... I'm so damn lonely! 10-1 I haven't seen O anywhere. I hear she's been around, I just keep missing her. I keep missing a lot of people. 10-2 Been drinking too much. Think I asked Kisa and Helga if they wanted to go home with me, but I'm not sure. I do know I woke up alone. Again. 10-3 Miss Zell. Damnit! I don't love her, but she's fun to be around and... I'm going home. Rosie

I've been staying at the Klub. Sleeping in the dressing room. I see that look in Giselle's eyes. I warned her. Don't fall in love with me. Now she looks at me with those puppy dog eyes and I feel terrible. It was a mistake to get involved with her. I knew she would end up hurt. So here I am, in hiding. She's a sweet girl and... I'm not. *orders another drink* I did spend a lovely evening with Ophilia. I don't know how she feels, but I will forever be tied to her. No matter where she goes, the distance between us, there will be a tether. We share something. It's not love. Not like what Giselle is feeling, or what Herman feels for the Maestra. It's a connection though. A bond. I'll never forget her. When these days are gone and I'm old and wrinkly and I've forgotten the rest of them. There will be Ophilia. Oh now I've gone poetic. *sits my glass down* No more drinking. These people; all of them have shown me so much kindness. A strange sort of love unlike any I've ever known. Emcee taking me in, Herman, Helga, Lulu, Frenchie, Sally, Danny, Giselle- all of them. Maybe I should go. I don't like caring! Wondering about Frankie. Worrying abou Giselle. Tiptoeing around the Emcee. Interfering trying to get Herman and the Maestra together. When did I start caring!? Why can't I stop? *orders another drink* It would be so easy to go home to Giselle. Home? Did I say home? I'm lost. I haven't worked in weeks. My kind of work. *looks around the room and smiles at a gentleman* Maybe it's time to get back in the game. Maybe that will harden my heart a little. *leaves with the man* Rosie

for the most part, I am back
Thanks for your patience and good thoughts.

I haven't been online.

I won't be on a lot.

Sorry.

Grma is sick.  In the hospital.

Umm, if we rp, use my characters at will.

No big.

I'll check in when I can.  At least once every 2 or 3 days.

Should be back full time within a week.

Rosie

Alone. For the first time in weeks. My breath quickens. I can't do this. I can't. *wants to go back inside* No more hiding! *starts to walk toward the club* You are Rosie! You are strong and beautiful and you can do this. *keeps walking* I know what I need. I need a man. Maybe the Emcee or Herman or Danny. Just someone. Anyone, just so that evil monster wasn't the last one. I'm going to go to the club, visit my friends, see the Emcee- talk to him about my job, maybe go see Frankie; Giselle told me how she's been. Yes I need to get out. Go 'round see people. Ophilia, I must see Ophilia. *stops dead in my tracks, two brownshirts walking my way* Move... move feet move. They stop and ask me if I'm all right. "It's the heat..." They tell me to go have a drink and I thank them for their help. Just like I thanked him for letting me go. I watch them walk off and I turn to go back to the flat. Stop this! No more hiding. *another deep breath and I continue my way to the club* I push open the heavy door and it smells... like home. I made it. At the bar I order a drink. Rosie

OK not really, but I was so nervous. Giselle said to be ready. So did my makeup and she tied this little pillow to my bum as it's still a little sore to sit properly and she took me there. I was so nervous. But now we're here. I've got a drink in front of me and that helps but I... I'm afraid to face them. Afraid they'll know. I don't know what I'm so embarrassed about. I guess it's that I should have known better. I should have... done something. I don't know. I watch Giselle from the table she left me at. Waiting for her return. I hate being alone. Rosie

Rosie? Rosie? Are you all right? I hear her. My name is funny. Say it. Rooooooooosie, Rooooooooooosie. *giggles* Giselle tells me my name is not funny. I keep trying to convince her it is. Roooooooosie. Oh well. "Giselle, did you tell Danny I love him? Because I do. I'll have to toss him a freebie." If I go back to that... *starts crying and laughing* Like I have a choice. Giselle just tells me over and over that it's going to be ok. Rosie
I don't know Danny that well. Don't know if he's nice or not. Don't much care. I love him. *pops another pill* Rosie

She had a meeting with Danny to get something for the pain.
I'm not sure he can be trusted but...

I need it.

*waitng*


Rosie

Last night beautiful, wonderful, Giselle helped me like no person ever has. She truly is my angel. She got Marie to help her get a bath in the room and then she bathed me. My arms hurt so badly from being bound I can barely lift them. She had to dress me as though I was an invalid. *sniffs* My legs, stomach and breasts look like I've been trambled on by a horse. I can't imagine what the back of me looks like. I heard Giselle crying. The burns must be pretty bad, because she'd try to bypass them with the washcloth but everytime she did she softly circled it and cried. I think he broke a couple of ribs, I am having some trouble breathing if I bend a certain way. That's ok. I've had one broken before. I know I'll survive. My insides feel like they are on fire. The things he did... the things he used... *shakes head...* What kind of a monster... *trails off* At least she told everyone I was sick. I... I know what I do for a living and I'm not ashamed but the things that monster did... he made me ashamed. He made me feel... dirty. *cries* I asked Giselle if she could get something, anything for the pain, anything to make me sleep. I want to go home. But I don't have one. I've never felt so alone in my life. Thank God for Giselle. I wish I were dead. Rosie

I went to see . I saw her on the street and was about to call out when I noticed she sped up her pace and kept glancing behind her. That's when I saw him. The Nazi. The one from the other night. The one who gave her a black eye. She got off easy... unless there was more she didn't tell me. I couldn't go back to the flat. I didn't want Helga to see me like this. I didn't know where to go but suddenly I found myself knocking on Giselle's door. Then I said the words I don't think I've ever uttered. "Help me." When she opened the door I collapsed in her arms. She tries to guide me to the chair but I told her that sitting was not very comfortable at the moment. I'm sure she didn't understand and I wasn't in the mood to explain. I was only trying to help. I didn't know... God, I had thought my father was evil.

The lights, the music... Herman. Oooh it was so fun, so exciting, so exhilerating! The eyes of the audience upon you... *shivers* I loved every minute of it. No, every second of it! I want to perform this number every night! After the show we all had a celebratory drink. Then some smarmy guy comes over and starts talking to Helga. Well you know us, we're all very protective of our little one. And then this jackass has the nerve to make a crack at Helga's expense! I swear I thought Herman was going to lay him out! He probably should have. But Danny, that's this fellow's name, he apologizes and we all pretend to forgive him, but if her hurts Helga... I'll hurt him. I know people. I do. So me and Herman... we went and... uh, expended some of our extra energy. Turned our anger at the stranger into something... nicer. I saw Herman today. Walking bowlegged he was. *laughs* I'm feeling mighty fine myself today. I saw Giselle and she said hello, but I think she was a little hurt I went with Herman last night. I know she likes him. But it was all in fun, besides we all know he's half in love with Liza! I should take her out later this week. Let her know I wasn't trying to hurt her. Maybe bring her back to the room and make up properly. Now that sounds like a plan. I saw O last night. She looked absolutely divine. I wonder if she made the dress she was in... I can't wait for the Emcee's return so I can talk to him about her. Rosie

is simply a delight. She's a dear and she's a costume designer... Oh dear Emcee... is there anyway I can persuade you into maybe hiring her? Dresses that she designed are going to be in a fashion show! So I was thinking... we could use someone like her around here... *bites lip* Emcee? What do you think? Kisa is leaving for the states for a few weeks and she sent me flowers! Roses! I can hardly wait for her return... I know just how to welcome her back. I still haven't met Dolores. She seems to be something of a troublemaker. So I don't really mind not knowing her. I'm thinking of finding Herman or Helga... see if they'd like to go book shopping. Maybe afterwards I could have a nice little nightcap with Giselle. I don't know... Rosie

Sorry I'm late lovies... I've met the most... generous man, but he was only in the city for two days... I think the only person I've seen lately was Herman... "Hi darling... Did you show the lyrics to the director?" Helga will be so happy! I've got money for the flat! Actually I have enough to get a bigger place and pay for it for awhile. But no... instead I shall go shopping. New shoes, new dress, new coat and a new hat. Maybe a book or two. Oooh the rumours are flying around the club! A new woma...err man... umm person has come. I understand she is quite the... umm lady. There is another woman, a Spaniard I think, who's been causing some trouble. First in the club and then with Kost. Well... if I'm not needed, I'm off to clean up and get some much needed rest. See Helga? I told you I'd come through. Rosie

Liza brought food to the club. Real food, not the scraps I've been living on. Delicious smelling, looking and tasting food. It whet my appetite for more. It may sound funny that food could be so intoxicating but it was. It wasn't just hot food in my belly, it was a kind gesture with no ulterior motive. I'm not used to that. It reminded me of my Mama... *sad* I will not live in the past, the good or the bad. I shall live for today for tomorrow? We all may be dead. I'm just so perky today. *sigh* I took Giselle home the other night. I ... I shouldn't have, she's turned into this... she's changed. Within a week she's gone from an untried virgin to a wanton woman. I'm going to hell for that one. I know it. Helga is worried we have to give up this flat... If so I'm going to ask Sally if she wants to share, I hear she's looking for a roommate. Anyway I promised Helga I'd get some money for rent... *checks face in the mirror, runs tongue over her teeth... (no lipstick there... good)* *cups breasts, raising them* Come on ladies... time to pay the rent. *leaves the flat* Rosie

you just moan and groan and cut yourself off and then your friends come to your rescue. The emcee and I spent some quality time together. Oh the things that man can do with his tongue... I should pay him! Umm just thinking about it... wonder if he's feeling better... Helga took me out for drinks and dancing. I don't know... she *confused* She's quite beautiful, but I wasn't sure what she wanted, and it's nice having a friend, so nothing happened. Giselle is being so flirtatious! Even with the Emcee. She's... I don't want to like it, but I do. And doesn't seem to mind if we have a repeat of our little tryst. I'm so happy I could cry. Especially when I think of Herman. He's so damn sensitive, he's in such pain. First Liza and now this thing with the Emcee. This is why I try not to tease him too much. I mean he's terribly handsome and I certainly wouldn't kick him out of bed, but he's nice. I don't want him to be hurt. Ahh, the show starts soon! I must get dressed! Rosie

*sings* whoa oh oh oh ohhh Herman Everyone has a crush on him! How could they not? He's smart and shy but charming and sexy... The other night I found him stumbling around and helped him to bed. No not in that fun way either. Eh, love's not in the cards for me anyway. Although sometimes I wonder what it's like... There's another working girl hanging about the club now. I haven't met her yet... I don't know how I feel about having to share. has been eating these eisstocks all week... everytime a drop runs down her delicate arm I want to lap it up... *sigh* What's wrong with me!? First I'm corrupting Giselle and now I'm thinking about Helga! I would go visit Kisa for some fun but she has her sister with her. At least the Emcee is always up for a little fun. Rosie

Ahh yes, after my little talk with Giselle... no talking would be the wrong term. We kissed. And it was nice, but she's so young, so innocent, I sent her on her way. Back in my room I think the churning in my stomach is worry over Giselle, how I don't want her to be like me. But no, it wasn't worry. I've caught whatever was going around. My body aches, my head is spinning and I just don't want to be bothered. *falls into bed* Sleep glorious sleep. Rosie ((ooc- very sick, hope to be back within a week))

The place looks lively now thanks to placing flowers on the tables in the club. That was so nice of her, I need to get to know some of the others a bit better. Oh Helga is feeling better and I was looking forward to maybe taking her out to dinner (as friends) but her friend Mary came to visit. It seemed as though I saw even less of her then. Poor has been locked away in her room saddened from the recent loss of a dear friend of hers. She wouldn't come out for anything, I hoped she was eating. Herman has been so worried. I caught him playing a melecholy song last night. I was about to offer some comfort when showed up. I hope things are better for them, even if it's only for a little while. I'm afraid that if it does work out for them that poor Giselle will be heartbroken. She's quite taken with our Herman Rosie

Wonderful news! Helga is up and feeling better! I was so worried. Darling Sally has returned! isn't leaving us after all. And I talked to Giselle. *sigh of relief* Everything is fine. So now ladies and gentlemen of the I give you my friend, . *pushes Giselle into the main room of the club* "Say hello." Rosie

Giselle left the Klub for about a week to tend to her sick mother. Since she's been gone I've had some time to do some thinking, the Emcee is right, she will find out soon enough. I don't have anything to be ashamed of. I only did what I've had to do to survive. *exhale* When she returns we're going to have a talk. I'd rather she hear it from me. and have been kind enough to keep her busy while I thought things through. Other news... not so happy, feel free to skip it altogether- Liza may be leaving us! I certainly hope not- sweet Herman will be so sad without her around. Frenchie's mother was in some sort of accident and she's been away caring for her. And poor is sick. I hear her coughing all day long. I tried to purchase some chicken soup from an old man in the market, but he looked at me and tried to triple the cost. In happier news... Herman had an erotic dream about me... Since Helga is sick (as if I need that excuse) I was thinking I would stop over and visit his room tonight, see what comes up. Ahh and I mustn't forget Emcee, he's likely to also want to try to decipher Herman's dream, since he was in it as well. I'm off to find some soup for Helga. Rosie

is here! At the Kit Kat Klub. Don't get me wrong, I love her, she's... she was like a little sister to me, but she, she doesn't know me now. The things I've done, the life I live- she knows about none of it. How could her mother send her to me!? Giselle has turned to me for help, for protection. What am I to do!? When she finds out what I am... I cannot think of that. She wants me to help her get a job. She's worried the emcee thinks she's a loose woman. What am I to do with such an innocent!? *starts to bite nails* I like her. I've known her since childhood, how can I corrupt her? How can I not? *sobs* Rosie

Last night was the opening. It was marrrrrrrrvelous! Herman, Emcee and I danced the night away while Charlie charmed us with her playing! My sweet Lulu was there but had to leave early. I did get to rub oil into her soft skin later that evening. No, no. I haven't won her affections- yet. I was just working the kinks out. I can't wait to do it all again. *grinning* I'm happy. It's been awhile. I like it. Rosie

Oh my I was so shaken I couldn't even speak of it before now. Our dear was attacked! And I found him! I'm used to dealing with blood and bruises-comes with the life, but to see our dear Emcee like that. I nearly fainted! Thankfully I gathered my head together enough to summon Herman. He was ... wonderful. And the emcee is ok, which is *exhales* I'm very thankful. And to celebrate his... birthday? We went to the baths. So now I know he's feeling better. We open soon, very soon. Tonite actually. *nervous* Rosie ((ooc- I might be here 12ish, but probably more like 1 EST))

What was wrong with me? Oh my... those eyes, those lips... ahh those lips, soft and sweet like berries. So refreshing after a long hard day. Sweet, sweet Kisa. And the Emcee? Bonus. Oh I could not be happier. Until... Herman. Sweaty, greasy... muscles straining as he worked on that squeaky piano peddle, I offered him a drink which he accepted and it was nice, but I think he's sweet on . OK I am going to show the Emcee the routine I worked out, I think Frenchie would be good as my partner. I can't believe I have two routines and haven't shown anyone. *deep breath* I am going to do it. Tonite. Or tomorrow. No no... tonite. Rosie

Wow, so much has happened. The emcee kicked me out. No, no, not in a bad way, more of a, "I need to be alone way" But I do miss him. So there I was all alone and nowhere to go! So I took my meager belongings and headed for Lulu's. She was so kind as to take me in. So in a way it was a blessing because I have friends. Real friends. Living with Lulu and Helga has been good for me. And we have all moved to a bigger flat, you should have seen us carrying things, pushing shoving conjoling... begging. Begging furniture to get thru the door! How sad is that? Ooh the emcee paid us, which was wonderful, but to be honest- just between you and me and the post... I wonder how he got the money, he was so distant when he returned. I've seen that look before. I've seen it in the mirror. Lots of new arrivals! So many, too many to mention. *waves at Kisa and Frankie (adorable... simply adorable!) and all the others. I spent a delicious evening with Bobby. What a dear man. *yawn* Rosie

I know, I know I'm in looooooooooove every other day and I will continue to pine for my sweet Lulu, never doubt that, but oh my, I think I've found someone of the female persuasion who is interested in little old me. She walked right into my room the other day and teased me for not saying hello sooner. Then she ... she waggled her tongue at me! I wanted to taste her right there ... show her all the wonderful uses I had for that glorious pink nub. Oh my sweet Fritzie, when will you come visit again? *sigh* I miss the emcee, can you tell? Come home soon! I thought I found new accomodations- not that I don't adore the emcee's bed, because I do, but I thought maybe he'd like a little privacy on occasion, so I saw talking to one of the girls out front but then I heard those words... no prostitutes. Wonder if she'd buy it if I told her I was the hooker with the heart of gold? *laughs* I don't think so either. Bobby stopped by and said hello, poor thing was sick. It seems everyone is. Ooh Lulu has been complaining of aches... I could offer a massage *bites lip* I wonder if she'd accept. More people are arriving everyday. The Klub is like a beacon to people who are like ships lost at sea... Rosie

Whew, I have been so busy lately! Rehearsing, learning new songs, avoiding the flu... our poor director was caught in the rain and was laid up in bed for a few days... you should have seen her shivering yet putting on a brave face for everyone who visited her. found some records and oh my, the music... it's so decadent! I love it. The emcee has been so happy lately. You can catch him smiling and laughing to himself. Ladies and gentlemen the men have landed! Carl and Bobby I haven't really spoken to either of them, but they look yummy! And we have a new clarinetist! All these wonderful people, and what do I do? Hide in the emcee's room reading or go out... avoiding them. I know how to make men and women happy, I know how to manipulate them, I know how to make them feel like the most important person in the world, and then never see them again. But this? Having friends... it's new. I shouldn't have pulled back. I know this. *determined to socialize more* R.

I have been so busy. I finally showed the emcee the song I worked out and he seems to think it would work. I spent the last two nights watching him mope, drink and smoke himself to oblivion. I think he's worried about the opening. And then I helped him smoke up the rest of his American cigarettes. I felt so horrible. It's not like I have a purseful of money to repay him with. So today I went out and met a few nice young gentlemen only too happy to open their wallets to me. I'm so tired, it's been awhile since I... umm danced with that many men in one day. *leaves some money by Emcee's bedside.* I spent some time helping Helga with some makeup. Now I have to show her how to cover up bruises. Well at least I have some expertise in that area; comes with the job. She showed me some of her own songs, they are simply wonderful! I gave the director some bawdy tunes. I hope Helga shows her the diddys she has worked up. What to say about Lulu *fans self* Oh my. That is all. Ooh and Herman! I almost forgot to mention Herman! He is so quiet and shy. (You know what they say about the shy ones...) Ahh we'll corrupt him soon enough! Rosie

I finally met Tex, what an accent! *sigh* It's like velvet, or bourbon... soft and liquidly. And you know, I think Emcee insulted me; he called me shameless- *giggles* well it is true. And Sally! What a gal, and her eyes... oh my... they speak volumes! I can't wait to hear her sing! Poor has been feeling useless- I have some uses for her, but I don't think she fancies me. Good news- she can cook! We'll have to get together for a tasty meal after the money starts pouring in... She's a sweet kid. Ooh and we have a new girl! Lulu. I haven't met her yet. Ahh today I decided to test out a couple little ditties on stage. That's me a busy little bee... Rosie
